subject: p12185775
History: Desaturations, congestion, evaluate for pneumonia or fluid overload.
Findings: AP and lateral views of the chest. Low lung volumes. Two calcified granulomas in the left lung are unchanged. No focal consolidation or pneumothorax. There are small bilateral pleural effusions. Cardiomediastinal and hilar contours are stable. Degenerative changes are again seen in the spine.
